english.segment1: Was it perfection that you've wanted. It always added up to be your fall to your mistake. You've wanted it to be inside your worst belief
english.segment2: Was it another thing you started. It always added up to be your fall to your mistakes. You've want it to be His voice that calls your name
english.segment3: And I'm sorry for all those things in me. And when I don't care I know you're always there
english.segment4: I just wanted to get this started
